channel.title: Jason and the Argonauts
channel.desc: The city of Iolcus has fallen under the rule of Pelias, the evil and tyrannical uncle of Jason, who was destined for the throne of Thessaly.

channel.name: Comet US
channel.title: Dragonquest
channel.desc: After the ruthless Krill (Brian Thompson) harnesses the power of a deadly fire-breathing dragon, he begins a bloody campaign of world domination. From the ashes of a scorched village, Arkadi (Daniel Bonjour), an unassuming farm boy, embarks on an arduous journey to restore the lost pieces of a mystical amulet - the only weapon powerful enough to destroy Krill. With the help of swordsman Maxim (Marc Singer) and his squire, Katya (Jennifer Dorogi), Arkadi struggles to save the world.

channel.desc: A virus on another world turns intelligent people into primitive beings.
